virtual void glr::BasicSceneNode::rotate ( const glm::detail::float32  degrees,
const glm::vec3 &  axis,
TransformSpace  relativeTo = TS_LOCAL 
)
virtual

Rotates the scene node around the axis 'axis' the specified number of degrees. This rotation is relative to the transform space specified by 'relativeTo'.
